description: Creates a network endpoint for the Remote Desktop Services (RDS) license server.

parameters.name: IdentityProviderArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the IdentityProvider resource that contains details about a registered identity provider. In the case of Active Directory, that can be a self-managed Active Directory or an Amazon Web Services Managed Active Directory that contains user identity details.

parameters.name: LicenseServerSettings
parameters.description: The LicenseServerSettings resource to create for the endpoint. The settings include the type of license server and the Secrets Manager secret that enables administrators to add or remove users associated with the license server. The ServerSettings resource contains the settings for your server. RdsSalSettings (dict) --- The RdsSalSettings resource contains settings to configure a specific Remote Desktop Services (RDS) license server. The CredentialsProvider resource contains a reference to the credentials provider that's used for RDS license server user administration. SecretsManagerCredentialsProvider (dict) --- Identifies the Secrets Manager secret that contains credentials needed for user administration in the Active Directory. SecretId (string) --- The ID of the Secrets Manager secret that contains credentials. The type of license server.

nested_params.name: ServerSettings
nested_params.description: The ServerSettings resource contains the settings for your server.

nested_params.name: RdsSalSettings
nested_params.description: The RdsSalSettings resource contains settings to configure a specific Remote Desktop Services (RDS) license server.

nested_params.name: RdsSalCredentialsProvider
nested_params.description: The CredentialsProvider resource contains a reference to the credentials provider that's used for RDS license server user administration.

nested_params.name: SecretsManagerCredentialsProvider
nested_params.description: Identifies the Secrets Manager secret that contains credentials needed for user administration in the Active Directory.

nested_params.name: SecretId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Secrets Manager secret that contains credentials.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that apply for the license server endpoint. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: IdentityProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the identity provider specified in the request.

nested_items.name: LicenseServerEndpointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the LicenseServerEndpoint resource.
